{{Wired embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=DFL-210 |revision= |asin=B000T5QH1M,B000T5QH1M;GB; |newegg=N82E16833127192 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf= |est_release_date=07/2007 |type=Router Firewall, VPN Router Firewall |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=0.8 |pwr_barrel_len=2.1 |cpu1_brand=Intel XScale |cpu1_model=IXP422;PRIXP422BB; |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Intel |fla1_model=JS28F320J3D75 |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY57V561620CTP-H |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI, Compact Flash, |expansion_minipci_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 20-pin header,, unpopulated |serial=yes,, console,, DB9,, (9600 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8100B |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8305SB |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=5 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=IDE Controller;Promise;PDC20275;;1; ,,, I2C Real Time Clock;Ricoh;RS5C372A;;1; ,,, 3.3V Zero Delay Buffer;Cypress;CY2305S;;1; ,,, RS-232 Transceiver;Analog Devices;ADM213;;1; ,,, Supply Voltage Supervisor;Texas Instruments;7705AC;;1; ,,, Synchronous Step-Down PWM Controller;Sipex;SP6123AC;;1; |flags=RTC w/ battery backup, |stock_boot=RedBoot |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui_eth=00:15:E9 }} {{TagLine|NetDefend Network Security Firewall}}
